SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_address WHERE a_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{a_name}, '%' )
) AS SUB ORDER BY a_seq LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_address(a_name, a_tel, a_address) VALUES (#{a_name}, #{a_tel}, #{a_address})
mapper.select: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_address ( a_seq BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, a_name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, a_tel VARCHAR(30), a_address VARCHAR(125) )
